Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 14 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto). Remains of erased text written against the fibres (verso) can be seen. EA 75356, 75357, 75358, 75359, 75360, 75361, 75362 are mounted together.
Curator's comments: Under study with a view to publication by Michael Zellmann-Rohrer [July 2017].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380743) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380743)
